name: BiomedicalPapersBot
description: A Telegram bot to retrieve PubMed papers' title, doi, authors and publication date based on general search terms or on specific publication names

name: Co(de)Pilot Bot
description: Discord bot that helps coders by refactoring their code and giving advice to them. Based on Jan.ai API

name: RespectFeelNess Bot
description: Discord bot that helps users by providing emotional support to them. Based on Jan.ai API
